pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for Spatial Point Pattern Analysis // Some wrappers, functions and data sets for for spatial point pattern analysis (mainly based on 'spatstat'), used in the book "Introduccion al Analisis Espacial de Datos en Ecologia y Ciencias Ambientales: Metodos y Aplicaciones" and in the papers by De la Cruz et al. (2008) doi:10.1111/j.0906-7590.2008.05299.x and Olano et al. (2009) doi:10.1051/forest:2008074.
